item.description:
GOLF 101 Lessons for New Golfers
– 6 Hours of hands on group lessons for only $100 (less than $17 per hour) with a Certified Teaching Golf Professional

Includes clubs and all course fees

Lessons are held at:

Miner Hills Golf Course,
85 Miner Hills Drive
Middletown, CT 06457

Pick any 3 classes to fit your schedule

Classes are held Tuesday and Thursday evenings, Saturday morning and Sunday Afternoons

Last year more than 100 new golfers graduated from Golf 101 lessons and April classes are filling up quickly!

* We will notify you of any postponements and to reschedule your makeup classes *

CLASSES AVAILABLE ON:

THURSDAY April 1 * 5:30 -7:30pm

SAT April 3 * 5-7pm

Thursday April 8 * 5:30 -7:30pm

SAT April 10 * 5-7pm

Thursday April 15 * 5:30 -7:30pm

SAT April 17 * 5-7pm

SUN April 18 * 4:30 -6:30 pm

Thursday April 22 * 5:30 -7:30pm

SAT April 24 * 5-7pm

SUN April 25 * 4:30 -6:30 pm

SUN May 2 * 4:30 -6:30 pm

SUN May 9 * 4:30 -6:30 pm

We will be adding more dates

Read about Golf 101 in the Hartford Courant:
Visit http://www.courant.co...

Reserve your spot today – visit http://www.GolfLesson... or call (860) 436-9449



For more details, check out our calendar.
This Meetup repeats every week on Thursday.
Where:
Miner Hills Golf Course
85 Miner Hills Drive
Middletown, CT 06457
860 436-9449

Price: $100.00 6 Hours Of Lessons

You can always get in touch with me through the "Contact Organizer" link on Meetup: http://www.meetup.com...
For more information, visit http://www.GolfLesson... or call (860) 436-9449

See You On The Course!

WHAT OUR STUDENTS ARE SAYING:

“ Golf 101 was a fun and inexpensive way to learn Golf from the beginning. Having never golfed before, I was nervous, but our Instructor George did a great job teaching our group, and I am having a great time in Golf 102!”
Rodney P, New Haven CT

“ Inexpensive, high quality Lessons in a small group, I made new golfing buddies and am enjoying the game of golf”
June B, Bloomfield CT

“ I have taken lessons from golf pros before, but Golf 102 Playing Lessons were more effective and less expensive than any other lessons.”
Jim S, Newington CT

“ I was not sure if I would enjoy Golfing so I tried Golf 101 and I love it! The Instructor was very patient and answered all my questions, and made the lessons fun!”
Gloria W, Milford, CT
item.how_to_find_us: Look for our Golf Instructor wearing the white www.CTGolfTips.com hat

group.name: CTMatch Singles Events Music Dance Speed Dating Golf Comedy

item.name: Golf season is here! Golf 101 lessons - 6 hours of hands on lessons - only $100
